content.webTitle: Aston Villa v Leicester: match preview

fields.headline: Aston Villa v Leicester: match preview
fields.bodyText: Leicester have had seven wins in a row and Brendan Rodgers is the recipient of an extended and improved contract until 2025 after never quite ruling himself out of the vacant Arsenal job until Friday. Demarai Gray comes back into contention for Sunday’s trip to Villa after missing the last two matches with flu and the manager hopes Ben Chilwell will make it after missing the midweek win over Watford with a hip injury. Villa are a point above the relegation zone after their midweek defeat at Chelsea but they have Anwar El Ghazi in contention after a knee injury. “They are on a fantastic run of form but there aren’t many teams who will come away from Villa Park and think they’ve had an easy game,” Dean Smith said. Mark Tallentire Sunday 2pm Sky Sports Premier League Venue Villa Park Last season n/a Referee Michael Oliver This season G12 Y40 R0 3.33 cards/game Odds H 7-2 A 3-4 D 3-1 ASTON VILLA Subs from Nyland, Kalinic, Taylor, Chester, Hause, Engels, Ramsey, Lansbury, Hourihane, Douglas Luiz, Kodjia, El Ghazi, Jota, Guilbert, O’Hare Doubtful El Ghazi (knee) Injured Davis (hamstring, 17 Dec), Steer (achilles, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y22 R1 Form LLLWDL Leading scorer Wesley 4 LEICESTER Subs from Jakupovic, Ward, Justin, Morgan, Choudhury, Fuchs, Praet, Albrighton, Gray, Iheanacho, Benkovic, Amartey, Mendy Doubtful Chilwell (hip) Injured James (calf, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y15 R0 Form WWWWWW Leading scorer Vardy 14
